titleStmt.title: John Pennyman's instructions to his children which also may be of service unto others, and therefore they are thus published : reade in fear, that you may receive a blessing.
titleStmt.author: Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
Pennyman, Mary, 1630-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be given by the author, or to be had at Dorman Newman's shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.

person.persName: the author, or to be had
